name: AmIright
0:
”Alexa open Am I Right”
”Am I correct”
”Tell me I am right”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: am i right
des:
Do you need a second voice around to tell you that you are correct? Look no further! Alexa, your best pal, is here to tell you that you are correct. 

Simple invoke the "Am I Right" skill to let people know that of course you are correct.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
